function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to contagious diseases through extensive use of public databases and scientific literature","Impact":"Increased risk of contracting contagious diseases if proper hygiene and safety measures are not taken","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene measures when accessing public databases and scientific literature, and adhere to safety guidelines","Technologies":"Use of online databases and electronic resources to reduce physical interaction","People":"Researchers, scientists, and individuals accessing the databases","Owner":"Research institutions, individuals, and database administrators"},{"Description":"Physical and mental health impact of social distancing and home confinement during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased levels of anxiety, stress, and depression in the general adult population","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support, promote social connection through virtual means, and implement relaxation techniques","Technologies":"Telehealth services, virtual support groups, mental health apps","People":"General adult population under social distancing and home confinement","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals, community organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate use of search strategies and terminology in the research protocol","Impact":"Inaccurate or incomplete retrieval of relevant scientific literature and data","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough training on search strategies, use standardized terminology, and validate search methods","Technologies":"Advanced search algorithms, artificial intelligence for data retrieval","People":"Researchers, research assistants, and database searchers","Owner":"Research institutions, academic supervisors, and database administrators"}]}
